## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (e0ab5ff4c024f4310299914d0f443ad8ed3a4559be8770d8ed79485650e783b8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@hyperion-util/cookies' @ 77.77.79 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
